author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OCTAVE IS HOLDING STEADY AS IT CONTINUES EAST-SOUTHEASTWARD...
summary: ...OCTAVE IS HOLDING STEADY AS IT CONTINUES EAST-SOUTHEASTWARD... As of 8:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 07 the center of Octave was located near 15.2, -118.0 with movement E at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OCTAVE IS HOLDING STEADY AS IT CONTINUES EAST-SOUTHEASTWARD... As of 8:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 07 the center of Octave was located near 15.2, -118.0 with movement E at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Octave (EP5/EP152025)
